{"id":1182287882,"question_id":3330,"lang":"dart","lang_name":"Dart","time":"2 weeks, 5 days","timestamp":1708540477,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"380 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1182287882/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Modify the Matrix","memory":"150.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n  List<List<int>> modifiedMatrix(List<List<int>> matrix) {\n    int m = matrix.length;\n    int n = matrix[0].length;\n    \n    // Create answer matrix and copy values from original matrix\n    List<List<int>> answer = List.generate(m, (index) => List<int>.from(matrix[index]));\n    \n    // Find maximum value in each column\n    List<int> maxValues = List.filled(n, -1);\n    for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {\n      for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {\n        maxValues[j] = maxValues[j].compareTo(matrix[i][j]) < 0 ? matrix[i][j] : maxValues[j];\n      }\n    }\n    \n    // Replace -1 values with maximum value in respective column\n    for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {\n      for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {\n        if (answer[i][j] == -1) {\n          answer[i][j] = maxValues[j];\n        }\n      }\n    }\n    \n    return answer;\n  }\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"modify-the-matrix","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
